citations.narrative:
There was no one available during business hours to allow APHIS Officials to enter and inspect the facilities,
property, records, and animals on13-FEB-19 at 3pm.
Arrived at Facility, building closed and empty. Internet search found news story in 'Indianapolis Business Journal'
dated September 14, 2018 reporting the school will close on Sunday September 16, 2018.

narrative:
2.38(b)
MISCELLANEOUS.
There was no one available during business hours to allow APHIS Officials to enter and inspect the facilities,
property, records, and animals on13-FEB-19 at 3pm.
Arrived at Facility, building closed and empty.  Internet search found news story in 'Indianapolis Business Journal'
dated September 14, 2018 reporting the school will close on Sunday September 16, 2018.
